no_match_description: Don’t worry! Get active, engage more, and soon you’ll find your perfect match. Keep exploring and connecting!
noMessages: There's no conversation yet. Start talking and get to know each other!
You_need_more_energy_to_continue_Tap_her:
You need more energy to continue.
 Tap here to recharge.
You_can_send_a_message_without_matching_: You can send a message without matching with someone!
claim_reward_text: You need at least 5 Star to claim the reward.
list_of_users_send_you_gift: List of users send you gifts
Make_sure_your_face_is_clearly_visible,_: Make sure your face is clearly visible, centered, and unobstructed.
Ensure_that_your_photo_is_taken_in_good_: Ensure that your photo is taken in good lighting to avoid shadows or dark areas.
Avoid_using_filters_or_any_image_enhance: Avoid using filters or any image enhancements.
Your_face_should_match_the_one_shown_in_: Your face should match the one shown in your profile image for verification purposes.
location_access_prompt: Please make sure to grant location access at least once for the app functionality to work properly.
description_for_energy: In our app, Energy allows users to engage with others in meaningful ways. Users can use their Energy to send messages to anyone in the app or give gifts to friends, enhancing their interactions. Additionally, when users refer new friends to the app, both the referrer and the referred user will receive bonus Energy as a reward, making it easier to connect and share with others. This system encourages users to stay active, invite friends, and enjoy even more rewarding experiences.
login_description: Discover new connections, chat, and find matches that fit your vibe!
privacy_policy: By clicking 'Next', you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
secondaryTextProfile: Provide your details to enhance your experience and find better matches.
whyDescription: Share your intentions and what you're looking for, so we can create meaningful connections.
locationDescription: Choose your country and city to help us provide better recommendations.
photoDescription: Choose a clear and friendly photo to represent yourself and make a great first impression.
firstPhotoDescription: Pick your main profile photo to create a strong first impression.
secondPhotoDescription: Choose another photo to give more personality to your profile.
enter_city_name_alert_message: You should enter your city name in English
face_detect_error: We cannot detect any face in your photo. Your photo should contain a face.
description_task_Profile: Complete your profile to enjoy more!
description_channel_Profile: Subscribe to our Channel on Telegram!
description_Starter_Energy: Get 599 of energy for quick power-ups.
description_mega_Energy: Power up with a substantial 2400 of energy.
description_supercharged_energy: Unlock massive energy with 5000 for ultimate performance.
referral_user_text: The user you referred through your invitation.
activity_based_claim_text: The Star reward is calculated based on user activity and is claimable every month. Only users with activity are eligible for the Star reward.
instagram_description: Connect your Instagram to give your matches a sneak peek into your world! Share your adventures, hobbies, and everyday moments for a more personal touch.
weekend_getaway_text: What's your idea of the perfect weekend getaway?
dinner_question_text: Who would you love to have dinner with, and why?
career_description: Let your potential matches know more about your career! Share where you work or what you do, so they can get a glimpse into your passions and ambitions.
personality_description: Let your personality shine through! Answer a few fun and insightful questions to help us match you with people who share your vibe. This is your chance to stand out!
insert_images_text: Insert more than 4 images in your profile
not_enough_matches_text: You don't have enough matches yet.
not_active_enough_text: You are not active enough. At least 80% activity is required.
connect_wallet_prompt_text: Please connect your wallet to view Ton options.
dob_prompt: Enter your date of birth to personalize your experience and improve match accuracy.
user_telegram_default_profile_picture: Set your Telegram default profile picture as your profile photo
premium_description: Get access to this feature by upgrading to a premium account!
education_description: Share your education background to let potential matches know more about your academic journey and interests. Connect through shared knowledge and experiences!
form_error_message: Please fix the errors in the form
anonymous_description: GapOn connects you instantly with strangers around the world for fun, safe, and anonymous conversations. Just tap and start chatting!
hold_on_anonymous: Hold on! I’m finding your match—just a little more patience!
randomchat_error_text: The other user has left the conversation.
description_profile_complete: Fill in your profile to unlock this feature and get better matches!
block_user_text: You have been banned for violating our privacy policy or engaging in inappropriate behavior.
form_message_us: You can contact us through this form
faq_description: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions
